named-query.name: boat.getAll
named-query.query: FROM BoatEntity b ORDER BY b.priority

named-query.name: boat.getAllEnabled
named-query.query: FROM BoatEntity b WHERE enabled = TRUE ORDER BY b.priority

named-query.name: boat.getAllDisabled
named-query.query: FROM BoatEntity b WHERE (enabled = FALSE OR enabled IS NULL) ORDER BY b.priority
